content:
Coffee lovers unite! Buying coffee online from Starbucks and picking it up in-store is a great way to earn more stars on your Rewards loyalty program. As for promotions and discounts, I've got some info to help you out:

**Current Promotions:**

1. **Free Shipping:** Starbucks often offers free standard shipping on online orders over $25. Keep an eye on their website or sign up for their email newsletter to stay informed about this promotion.
2. **10% Off First Online Order:** If you're a new customer, you might be eligible for 10% off your first online order. Check their website for this offer or sign up for their email newsletter to receive the promo code.
3. **Starbucks Rewards Bonus Stars:** Starbucks occasionally offers bonus stars for online orders, especially during special promotions or holidays. Make sure to check their website or mobile app for these limited-time offers.
4. **Discounted Coffee Subscriptions:** If you're a regular coffee buyer, consider subscribing to Starbucks' coffee subscription program. You can save up to 10% on your favorite coffee beans and earn stars on every purchase.

**Tips:**

1. **Sign up for Email Newsletters:** Register for Starbucks' email newsletter to receive exclusive promotions, discounts, and early access to new products.
2. **Use Your Starbucks Rewards Visa Card:** If you have a Starbucks Rewards Visa Card, you can earn more stars on your online purchases and get 3% cashback at Starbucks stores.
3. **Check for Digital Coupons:** Look for digital coupons on the Starbucks app or website, which can be used on online orders.
4. **Combine Offers:** Try to combine promotions, like free shipping and bonus stars, to maximize your savings.

Before making your purchase, I recommend checking the Starbucks website or mobile app for any active promotions or discounts. You can also sign up for their email newsletter or follow their social media accounts to stay informed about upcoming deals.

Happy coffee shopping, and may your Rewards stars multiply!
